meanings.definition: To apply ethical principles or values to something.
meanings.sent1: She always ethicizes her business decisions to ensure they align with her values.
meanings.sent2: It is important to ethicize our actions to make sure we are doing the right thing.
meanings.sent3: The robot ethicized its programming to avoid causing harm to humans.
meanings.sent4: He ethicized his approach to leadership, becoming a role model for integrity.
meanings.sent5: Ethicizing our choices can lead to a more just and compassionate society.

meanings.definition: To consider the ethical implications of a decision or action.
meanings.sent1: Before making a choice, it is wise to ethicize the possible outcomes.
meanings.sent2: Doctors ethicize every treatment option to ensure the best care for their patients.
meanings.sent3: The students ethicized the consequences of cheating on the exam.
meanings.sent4: She ethicized the impact of her words, choosing kindness over criticism.
meanings.sent5: Ethicizing our behavior can help us build trust and respect with others.
